p: In a PD rat model, bowel inflammation can exacerbate neuroinflammation and disrupt the bloodâ€“brain barrier (BBB), leading to dopaminergic neuronal loss in the substantia nigra [ 18]. Further, several studies have shown clinical evidence of bowel inflammation in PD patients [ 13, 16, 23]. However, the possible connection between inflammatory processes in the GI tract and PD questions whether IBD could constitute a risk factor for developing PD or eventually exacerbate disease progression.
